name: Ace Flipit Plane - Classic Flappy Flyer FREE
name_original: Ace Flipit Plane - Classic Flappy Flyer FREE
description:
******* Free Airplane Tapping Game! *******

******** Addicting platformer action *******

Help our cute airplane get past tall towers in its biggest adventure ever!

Fly your way through worlds of intense platforming madness in this tough-as-nails classic arcade game! This is a retro-style platformer with cute animation, awesome soundtrack and challenging levels!

With exceptionally clever level design, gorgeous graphics and solid platform dynamics you'll want to keep playing and playing.

Have you got what it takes to win in this classic side scrolling action adventure?

Features:

* Multiple levels of excitement
* Awesome animations
* Optimized performance
* Smooth and polished gameplay
* Exciting music tracks

Harness the power of pure fun!

Download FREE Today!
